column2: About Tucker - I am a piece of crap -  Carlson - How pathetic. Bet he hated high school!!!!!!!!!!!
column5: Don’t you just want to wipe that smirk off his face?? What an asshole. Is this really the only thing he has to hide. Really?? Strongly doubt it. All about one’s karma in the end. I sure would not want to be him. Boy does he have shit coming around. What a little turd Kill gay people society —  Jesus Christ. What the fuck is wrong with this guy?? Click on his year book detail.  Asshole is an understatement.  I am pretty sure he had a bad high school experience —  shitty bow tie and that smirk.  Couldn’t have gone too well. SOOOOO christian —  hahahahahaha. Is that why he is such an asshole now — I wonder?? Cause he was such a fucking lowly piece of shit back then? Like ego problems?  Sure bet he got picked on — a lot. What I really want to say about him I would probably get in trouble for.  Oh Tucker..... https://t.co/er4XTDdFNg Such a fucking joke this guy really is.
